data.text: @KenyaMissionUK @MEsipisu @vickyford @FCDOGovUK @WaiJk @ForeignOfficeKE @AmbMKamau @k_kamere @StateHouseKenya @sikenye @NyangePatience @MamboZuri1 @YKinoti Nakuomba tafadhali saidia Ruto aweze kukutana na huyo Vicky Ford, asirudi bure pris. Hata kama ni salamu tu kwa Naibu wa Rais.

@KenyaMissionUK @MEsipisu @vickyford @FCDOGovUK @WaiJk @ForeignOfficeKE @AmbMKamau @k_kamere @StateHouseKenya @sikenye @NyangePatience @MamboZuri1 @YKinoti "Girls education" is a popular yet alienating approach to education in Africa. Boys have dreams too. They also have their own peculiar challenges. We need to be inclusive and give children an EQUAL chance to QUALITY and AFFORDABLE education all the way to university.
